title: Swamp Music
description: Bored on a quiet day? Why not make a little music? The critters in Swamp Music do just that, using their special attributes to create a song together. This story, for the emergent reader, is lighthearted and fun, and provides an excellent vehicle for teaching how to sequence events and use rhyme.
meta: band, music, play, quiet, swamp, whole
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand text
Rhyme : Identify and produce rhyming words
Quotation Marks : Understand and use quotation marks

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
